Author: VegetarianCurry
Text: Try and drink a bit more water. It might sound stupid and counterintuitive, but it does help. I am sorry about that, I know it feels horrible :(

Author: MontyMcLemon
Text: I’m sorry you’re going through this. I binged today too. The only thing that helps my bloating from binging is to lower intake of salt to almost nothing for a few days or just fast... Take care of yourself the best your mind allows, the holidays are a huge trigger for so many of us. I believe in you!
